show_name: Dragon Ball Movie 2: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
other_title: Dragon Ball: La bella addormentata a Castel Demonio (Italian)
Dragon Ball: La bella addormentata nel castello dei misteri (Italian)
Dragon Ball: La bella durmiente en el castillo del mal (Spanish)
Dragon Ball: La princesa durmiente en el castillo encantado (Spanish)
Dragon Ball: Le château du démon (French)
Dragon Ball: Majinjou no Nemuri Hime (Japanese)
ドラゴンボール 魔神城のねむり姫 (Japanese)
plot: Goku and Kuririn are given an assignment by Kame-Sen'nin: "Retrieve the sleeping princess from Lucifer and I will take you as my students." But the mission proves to be more perilous than originally thought.
